verbose_text: Inspired by this distribution phenomenon, we constructed the PTX / alphaGC co-loaded liposome, in which alphaGC played a major role in spleen tissue and triggered the downstream immune response against tumor, and meanwhile, PTX took the lead and exerted its antitumor effect directly at tumor sites.
evidence: PTX/alphaGC co-loaded liposome, in which alphaGC played a major role in spleen tissue and triggered the downstream immune response
